About the Company: IKYA Human Capital Solutions Pvt Ltd is the fastest growing HR solutions company in India, with specialized service offerings in Staffing Services, Training and Skill Development, Executive Search, Recruitment Solutions and Training and Project based RPO hiring. Headquartered at Bengaluru, they provide world class HR services through their company owned offices across India to over 500 organizations, including leading MNCs and large Indian firms across industries..The company also in the business activities of People & Services, Global Technology Solutions, Industrial Asset Management, Integrated Facility Management.
